I think the tragedy is that Raine is among the least racist of anyone besides amnesia Trace, but she's incredibly racist...towards herself.
She wants humans and Keidran to be able to coexist, and sees them as people rather than animals, as friends...
But she imagines herself being a keidran to be a curse, something to be avoided...
And in her fear, she's inadvertantly insulting Roselyn, who in turn is becoming hurt and resentful...
Plus her partially warped mindset means that her offered solution, even if it has a test behind it, might not be the best one.
It's clear that they both need some development-Roselyn needs to be a bit less strict, and Raine needs to realise that she doesn't have a curse, and to accept herself and her ability as is.
